snippet: A home run by Ike Davis gave the Mets a 7-6 spring training victory over the visiting Yankees before a full house in Port St. Lucie, Fla., Tuesday.
abstract: New York Mets defeat New York Yankees, 7-6, in spring training game.

byline.contributor: Richard Sandomir, Ken Belson, Tyler Kepner and David Waldstein contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: A home run by Ike Davis gave the Mets a 7-6 spring training victory over the visiting Yankees before a full house in Port St. Lucie, Fla., Tuesday.

headline.seo: The Subway Series Is Renewed, Minus the Subway
headline.main: Subway Series Is Renewed, Without the Subway
headline.print_headline: Subway Series Is Renewed, Without the Subway
